Introduction
This topic contains information on A&A and housebound benefits for survivors, including
who may qualify for
A&A benefits under 38 CFR 3.351
, and
housebound benefits under 38 CFR 3.351(e) and (f)
, and
authorizing A&A without a rating decision
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Aid and Attendance (A&A) and Housebound Determinations for Survivors
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
